Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Many people in Australia are feeling the pinch of high living costs with concerns about inflation remaining high. However there is optimism around the upcoming federal budget with many calling for increased household assistance to address rising prices. In response to years of underfunding and neglect several iconic national parks are set to receive a much-needed makeover which will benefit tourism and create employment opportunities. Despite these positive developments there are still concerns about the impact of rising rent prices and the potential for increased interest rates which could put further pressure on household budgets.
